headline: Credit quality shows signs of having peaked
summary: (Bloomberg) -- In 2022, after the Federal Reserve started raising rates at the fastest pace in decades, some blue-chip US companies vowed to start cutting their debt loads. Those days may be over now. headline: Sovereign Funds Pull Back On Transactions; Financial Media Deal Value Rises
summary: Both sovereign wealth funds and pension funds deployed less capital into new deals as M&A markets cooled in 2022 and 2023.
